import React from 'react' import './Balance.css' import { financialData } from '../../../Data/Data' const Balance = ({toggleTab}) => { function handleClick() { console.log('what the hell is going on??') } return (
Balance: Ksh {financialData.balance.toLocaleString()}
Last Period Expenses: Ksh {financialData.lastMonth.expenses.toLocaleString()}
Transact now
) } export default Balance
